name: Basketball Data
title: Basketball Data
description:
Broadage Basketball API can deliver any type of data for a basketball match, tournament or team; including livescores, play-by-play, boxscore, match statistics & many more. Our Basketball Coverage includes 100+ tournaments from all around the world with in-depth coverage, giving you the opportunity to present the best sports data to users located anywhere.
This is a limited version in RapidApi. Please, click here to start your Free Trial and try the endpoints with live data now!

endpoints.name: Recent Match List
endpoints.description:
Provides the result list of the last 20 matches between the two teams in overall, with home and away filters.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

endpoints.name: Result Statistics
endpoints.description:
Provides the result list of the last 20 matches between the two teams in overall, with home and away filters.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

endpoints.name: Tournament Info
endpoints.description: Current season, stage structure(divisions,conferences etc.), country and many more information about a tournament.
